data.title: Get Something Brewing - Episode 2 | KitchenAid
data.description:
For episode 2 of Get Something Brewing, Mark Dundon of Paramount Coffee Project and Tyler Wells sat down to discuss Mark’s journey from Australia to America to open PCP’s first cafe in Los Angeles. They go on to discuss ideas in hospitality, flavor and innovations within home brewing equipment starting with the KitchenAid® Precision Press.
 
The Precision Press Coffee Maker is a classic French press enhanced with added technology like a built-in scale and timer to precisely craft a bold, full bodied brew. Learn more about the innovation behind KitchenAid® Precision Press Coffee Maker: http://kitchen.ai/FPew9Y

data.title: Get Something Brewing - Episode 1 | KitchenAid
data.description:
Colby Barr (Verve Coffee) and Tyler Wells (Blacktop Coffee) sat down for the first episode in this series to discuss the pursuit of flavor around the globe, from beans to brewing. To fuel their conversation, they each had a cup of Verve Panama Elida Green Tip Gesha made with the KitchenAid® Precision Press Coffee Maker. 

The Precision Press Coffee Maker is a classic French press enhanced with a built-in scale and timer to precisely craft a bold, full bodied brew. Learn more about the KitchenAid® Precision Press Coffee Maker: http://kitchen.ai/FPew9Y

data.title: Specialty Coffee Association of America Expo | KitchenAid
data.description:
From the doughnut wall to the Great Moments gallery to the live Sprudgecast, our event with Sprudge at the SCAA Expo was truly unforgettable! 

Thanks again to Ruby Roasters, Verve Coffee, Counter Culture Coffee, Madcap Coffee and Equator Coffees for providing the coffee, and to Creature Comforts Beer for providing the beer. To learn more about KitchenAid® Craft Coffee Products, visit http://kitchen.ai/uNEajB.

data.title: Presenting the Siphon Coffee Brewer | KitchenAid
data.description: Introducing the KitchenAid® Siphon Coffee Brewer. This revolutionary brewer provides all the beauty and precision of full-immersion vacuum brewing in a simplified system made for the home. So you’re never far from a complex, velvety cup of craft coffee. Shop now: http://kitchen.ai/UU6QO

data.title: Introducing the Precision Press Coffee Maker | KitchenAid
data.description: We designed the KitchenAid Precision Press Coffee Maker to brew authentic French press coffee at home. Its integrated scale makes it easy to measure the coffee and water, while the timer ensures proper steep time. The stainless steel dual-wall construction of the carafe provides better insulation for hotter coffee. The result is a bold, full-bodied cup of craft coffee made right at your countertop. Learn more: http://kitchen.ai/URA0F

data.title: Life Tastes Better With Coffee | KitchenAid
data.description: Our goal in creating the Siphon Coffee Brewer, Pour Over Coffee Brewer, Precision Press Coffee Maker and Burr Grinder was to bring the coffeehouse experience into the home by automating brewing methods celebrated within coffeehouse culture. We studied the art and science of many craft brewing methods in order to create coffee brewers that deliver the precision and mastery of the best baristas. Now, it’s simple to enjoy an authentic cup of craft coffee at home—because life tastes better with coffee. http://kitchenaidcraftcoffee.com

data.title: The Siphon Coffee Brewer | KitchenAid
data.description:
Introducing our latest craft coffee innovation: the KitchenAid® Siphon Coffee Brewer. This home brewer uses a full immersion technique that was once exclusive to premier coffee houses. We’ve retained the theatrical beauty and precision of the process and simplified it for home use. The result is a complex, velvety and flavorful cup of coffee. 
Learn more at http://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/coffee-products/

data.title: Pour-Over Coffee Brewer | KitchenAid
data.description: Our new Pour-Over Coffee Brewer combines the art of manual craftmanship with the convenience of automated technology. By mimicking the pour-over process of professional baristas, the brewer extracts bright, full-flavored coffee. Learn how you can capture more layers of flavors at http://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/craft-coffee/.

data.title: Electric Kettle | KitchenAid
data.description: The KitchenAid® Electric kettle quickly and quietly brings water to a boil in minutes right at your countertop, desk or office. With a 5 cup capacity and removable base, it’s stylish and convenient. Learn more at http://www.kitchenaid.com/kitchenware/kettles/.

data.title: Craft Coffee Brewers | KitchenAid
data.description: We studied the artistry of hand-crafted coffee and engineered all of our craft coffee brewers to provide an authentic, aromatic experience at home. Each brewer was designed to extract a full, satisfying flavor you’ll want to savor. It’s home-brewed, craft coffee at the touch of a button. http://kitchenaidcraftcoffee.com/

data.title: Nespresso by KitchenAid
data.description: Introducing Nespresso by KitchenAid®. Designed to delight coffee lovers, this espresso machine features six pre-programed cup sizes and a die-cast, premium metal design. Choose from a wide range of 22 grand crus and whip up hot or cold milk froth to make your ultimate beverage. It’s elegant, intuitive and convenient. It’s design meets taste. Coming in December.
